remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集，区域是包含服务器控件，可提供一致的用户界面 (UI) 所包含的控件的模块化布局的 Web 页面上的区域。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains server controls, and provides modular layout with a consistent user interface (UI) for the contained controls. 有两种常规类型的区域控件的派生自基类：区域和区域。There are two general types of zone controls that derive from the base class: zones and zones. 区域包含服务器控件 (可以是自定义控件或其他服务器控件，包括 ASP.NET 控件和用户控件)。The zones contain server controls (which can be custom controls, or other server controls including ASP.NET controls and user controls). 这些控件构成网页上的主用户界面，并且是在所有可能的显示模式中可见，除非它们隐藏以编程方式或用户。These controls form the primary UI of a Web page and are visible in all the possible display modes, unless they are hidden programmatically or by a user. 区域是显示仅当一个页面是与区域关联的特定显示模式中时，这些区域还包含特殊的服务器控件，使用户可以修改布局、 外观、 属性和内容的特殊帮助程序区域通过网页浏览器中。The zones are special helper zones that appear only when a page is in certain display modes associated with the zone, and these zones also contain special server controls that enable users to modify the layout, appearance, properties, and content of Web pages from within a browser. 开发人员可继承自基类，或任何派生区域，以创建自定义区域。Developers can inherit from the base class, or any of the derived zones, to create custom zones.
